title: What should be the latest update for my build?
content:
I have recently bought a Pixel 4a which currently is on build RP1A.200720.010. What should be the latest Android Security and Google Play System update on my phone? The current version on my phone is:
1. Android Security - 5 September 2020
2. Google Play system update - 1 December 2020

I am asking because some known people who bought the phone after me have received the Dec Android Security update.
